org.csstudio.platform.simpledal
Interface IProcessVariableValueListener<E>

Type Parameters:
E - the type of channel values expected (String, Double, etc.)
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractProcessVariableConnectionServiceTest.TestListener, ProcessVariableConnectionServiceTest.ProcessVariableListener, ProcessVariableValueAdapter
public interface IProcessVariableValueListener<E>

Listener, which can be connected to control system channels using an IProcessVariableConnectionService.

Author:
Sven Wende
